LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.label: AI-personekärna
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.description: En hyperavancerad datorkärna som innehåller en övermänsklig artificiell intelligens. I dess isolerade tillstånd är kärnan inaktiv. Installerad i en ordentlig stödstruktur däremot, kan den bli ett sinne med skrämmande kraft.
LanguageData.Neurotrainer.label: neurotrainer
LanguageData.Neurotrainer.description: A one-use nanotech trainer device. The neurotrainer is inserted through the orbit of the eye and releases nanomachines into the subject's brain, quickly improving their skills in a specific area.
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.label: thrumbo horn
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.description: A thrumbo's horn. It's razor-sharp, very hard and priceless in most markets. This is a true trophy.
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.label: elephant tusk
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.description: An elephant's tusk. Very durable and valuable. Deadly but somewhat unwieldy as a weapon.
